note: I am Raeez Kuhn from South Africa Johannesburg, i am totally blind and i am a dj and a producer. I am born 13 March 1996. I am very kind and love meeting new people and i love my career as a dj. I can read and write braille, i can use a laptop/computer with text to speech software called NVDA screen reader. I can dj on a controller and cdj's and a controller and on a laptop or pc. I am upsessed with feet. Dont be limited by your disability, #i am the future
